values:
When the world turns away,
one never seems to stay.
So with her broken heart,
she turns and runs away.

The world screamed at her,
telling her the darkness in life,
never once could she fight back.
So she fled while the world ignored.

Now alone she cries herself to sleep,
wishing she could be saved,
but her knight is to far away,
so all she can do is hope and pray.

The world screamed at her, 
telling her the darkness in life,
never once could she fight back.
So she fled while the world ignored.

Years gone by,
nothing has changed.
The world shuns her,
her knight to far to grasp.

The world screamed at her,
telling her the darkness in life,
never once could she fight back.
So she fled while the world ignored.

Here she sleeps so peacefully,
the empty bottle still in her hand.
She thought she could kill the world,
but only ended up destroying herself.
No one seemed to notice,
the fact she wasn't there.
She still lies peacefully in  her bed,
as a testement the world gave.

The world screamed at her,
telling her the darkness in life,
never once could she fight back.
So she fled... and the world won.

I don't even know why I try. I try to make my parents happy, I can do that with my Dad but my mom... it seems like she wants me to be perfect. I can't do it! I try to talk to her about how I feel (I get angry for the smallest reasons and I'm not sure why) and all she does is get upset and point out that I need to learn how to deal with these things and make them right... she doesn't help me, she reprimands me. And I feel like it's all my fault (it might as well be). And I am having a hard time with Algebra and the first thing she says is "I don't want to work on it now because I don't want to get agrivated" and there was so much other stuff. It makes me feel like I can't do a thing right ya know? I just can't wait till I move, I can get away from this. I mean, when I get hurt emotionally I feel like my heart hurts, ya know? It's a physical stabbing pain, and I just don't know what to do. I have a major self-esteem problem, random fits of anger, easy to annoy, and also easy to hurt and she knows it but all she can say it "oh it's only in your head!" maybe it is, but what if it isn't?

I'll feel like I can do something right... one day... someday... it'll happen. I'll be optimistic about that.


.:Kallisto:.

i wish i didn't lie,
about how i cry.
Inside of me i fall,
like a crumbling wall.

all you do is look,
as if reading a book,
you didn't save me,
you just let me be.

i don't want to lose you,
to feel so cold and cruel,
but i can't do this alone,
and yet you seem prone.

i don't know what to do,
look at all we've gone through,
help me i beg you,
do you know what to do?

I feel so far away,
you make me feel ill,
i groan and i sway,
as you gaze begins to kill.

all you can do is hurt me so deep,
why can't you love me,
is that such a leap?

I feel like breaking down,
whenever you speak,
only for you to tell me,
to smile... not frown.

My heart once was joyful,
but not anymore,
you hurt me so deep,
come on, bring on more.

I can't promise anything,
that i'll live  all the way through it,
but keep hitting me hard
don't stop hitting, if i have a fit.

a fit of laughter,
a fit of coughing,
do not stop,
even though i'm your daughter.

i feel so betrayed,
left fary away,
unable to speak,
or runaway.

I resort to faking,
my joy and my love,
it's time to let go,
and i watch the white dove.

it flies away,
away from me,
the last of my love,
to you from me.

all the care in the world
could not mend my heart,
so i'll cry,
atleast that's a start.

it makes me feel better, 
makes me feel free,
thought i won't be living happily.

you stole my heart,
my sister, my friend, 
and tore me apart,
without moving a hand.

I feel i could die,
that's how i feel,
yet you don't care,
so how can i deal?

i gained and i lost,
like i always do,
but why did you make it so
out of the blue?

not many can make me smile
like you once could,
given the chance,
do you think i would?

would i smile, and laugh,
and play happily?
Or would i pout and cry,
and tell you to just leave?

I feel so alone
so lost and unguided.
i would not have trusted you...
had i known.

all i can do is blink and stare,
as you hunt down others,
like a wolf and a hare. 

was i just a victim? an innocent soul?
to prey and to feed on,
not to love and to hold?

i no longer have my sister,
that i thought i once had,
i only have the pain and the sorrow,
caused by your hand.

it hurts me to much to love you the way i do,
but when you talk to me, i finally see the truth.

you never loved more,
nor did you care,
all you do is laugh and stare.

laugh at my pain as i cry myself to asleep,
i pray the lord my soul to keep.

so the walls come back up,
distanced i have become,
so just sit down and shut up.

You hurt me so much,
the wound, it goes deep,
how do you even,
expect me to sleep?

i feel horrible and fearful,
as each day runs away,
now i realize i must be careful.

my heart is all ice,
no thanks to you,
you've broken me now,
broken me twice.

the first i forgave you,
and trusted you too.
then you did again,
and broke me in two.

thank you, i should say,
say to you,
now i can rot and decay,
in the shadow of truth.

am i not good enough? 
am i not worth the time? 
you promised me love,
is that such a crime?

I cry myself to sleep,
each night of each week,
thoughts about you just make me weep,
as i fall down and cry myself to sleep.

Red rover red rover,
i hear the pain call,
send Krystal right over
i run and i fall.
There i stand chained with all the pain,
unable to leave unable to gain.

i fake all my laughs and all my smiles,
but all i have is pain for miles and miles.

Here i sit unable to think,
just singing my heart out,
just as i sink.

i sink in my tears unable to breathe,
the water surrounds me as i begin to plead.
"Save me, please save me" i try to call out,
but you are to busy to notice the shout.

i'm losing my life bit by bit,
and i watch it pass by as i sit.

you destoryed soul, and most of my life
like you took my wrist to your knife.

now all i can do is sit and plead,
"help me, help me please."
but farther and farther away you lead,
you lead yourself away from me, 
now watch me die in a tearful sea.
